channel.title: Heavy Hitters
channel.description: Heavy Hitters, hosted by Dean Gutic, is your one-stop shop for all things contact sports. Every week, Dean will be discussing the likes of NFL and college football, baseball, hockey, and UFC fighting. Be sure to tune in weekly for all the heavy hits and harder takes!
channel.itunes:author: High Tops Media & Dean Gutic

item.title: CFB Playoff Reaction, Predictions, and NY6 Bowl Game Review (ft. Keenan Womack)
item.description:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean, along with special guest Keenan Womack, give us their reactions to the CFB playoff ranking that came out on Sunday, along with their predictions, X-factors, Heisman picks, and a review of all the NY6 bowl games.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

item.title: Conference Championship Week Discussion, Frank Reich Fired, NFL Week 13 Picks, Cardinals Going All Out for Pitching, Patrick Kane, NHL Biggest Surprise/Disappointment After November
item.description:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us a review of the top 25 rankings along with his conference championship week picks, a breakdown of the Heisman trophy race and playoff predictions after the games. Then he gives us his reaction to the Reich firing and his week 13 picks. After that Dean gives us his thoughts on the Cardinals address pitching in the offseason so far. Finally, he closes out the episode with his reaction to Patrick Kane being signed by Detroit along with the Wild making a coaching change and a breakdown of his biggest surprise and disappointment thus far in the season.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

item.description:

item.title: NFL Week 10 Takeaways and Week 11 Quick Picks, CFB Week 11 Takeaways and Week 12 Picks, UFC 295 Recap
item.description:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives you his NFL week 10 takeaways and week 11 picks, along with an update on the new playoff rankings and predictions for this week’s matchups in week 12 of the college football season with the playoff race heating up. After that, Dean gives us a recap of the co-main and main event of UFC 295 to close out the episode.

item.title: NFL Week 9 Takeaways and Week 10 Quick Picks, CFB Week 10 Takeaways and Week 11 Picks, UFC 295 Picks and Craig Counsell to the Cubs Reaction
item.description:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives you his NFL week 9 takeaways and week 10 picks along with an update on the new playoff rankings and predictions for this week’s matchups. After that, Dean gives us his reaction to former Brewers Craig Counsell being hired by the Chicago Cubs. Finally, Dean gives us his picks for the Co-main and main event of UFC 295 to close out the episode.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

item.title: NFL Week 7 Takeaways and Week 8 Quick Picks, MLB AL/NLCS Recap and World Series Prediction, and UFC 294 Review
item.description:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives you his NFL week 7 takeaways and week 8 picks along with a recap from the Thursday night matchup between the Buffalo Bills and Tampa Bay Buccaneers. After that, Dean gives us an update on the MLB postseason regarding the ALCS and NLCS along with his prediction for the 2023 World Series. Finally, Dean gives us a recap of what happened in the Co-main and main event of UFC 294 to close out the episode.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

item.title: NFL Week 6 Takeaways and Week 7 Quick Picks, CFB Week 8 Quick Picks and AP Poll Review, MLB AL/NLCS and NHL Opening Week Reaction and UFC 294 Picks
item.description:
This week on Heavy Hitters, Dean gives you his NFL week 6 takeaways and week 7 picks and week 8 picks in college football along with a review of the top 25 of the weekly AP Poll that came out early this week leading up to the big week 8 matchups. After that, Dean gives us an update in the MLB postseason regarding the ALCS and NLCS. Finally, Dean gives us his reaction and takeaways from the start of the NHL season along with his predictions for the co-main event and main event for UFC 294 to close out the episode.

item.title: MLB Weekly Recap, NFL Draft, Aaron Rodgers to the Jets and Deion Sanders
item.description:
This week on the Heavy Hitters podcast, Dean and Charlie give us a recap of the best and worst from this past week in baseball along with some of their predictions for the upcoming NFL draft along with their reaction to Aaron Rodgers being traded to the New York Jets and Deion Sanders, having players from Colorado, leave to the transfer portal.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

item.title: MLB Takeaways, NHL Playoffs Talk, Israel Adesanya Takes Back the Middleweight Belt and Dan Snyder Sells the Team
item.description:
This week on the Heavy Hitters podcast, Dean and Charlie give us their takeaways so far in the MLB season based on what’s been going on around the league, along with a recap of the 2022-23 NHL season and a preview of the playoffs. After that, both go over the knockout win from last week for Israel Adesanya as he regained the Middleweight belt by knockout against Pereira, and finally they give us their reaction to Dan Snyder selling the Washington Commanders to a new owner for $6 Billion.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

item.title: MLB Opening Weekend, NFL Free Agency Reactions, NHL Wild Card Race
item.description:
This week on the Heavy Hitters podcast, Dean and Charlie welcome us into the 2023 MLB season as they give us their thoughts so far on the new rules in baseball with opening weekend, along with what they have seen from their teams and other teams across the MLB. Then they give us their reactions in NFL free agency to the moves that have occurred so far this offseason. They end off with some wild card predictions in the NHL along with the update on the standings and the playoff race.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

item.title: MLB Part 3 Division Preview, NFL QB Carousel, and Jon Jones
item.description:
This week on the Heavy Hitters podcast, Dean and Charlie preview part three of their preview series of each MLB division with the NL West along with their NL wild card picks. Afterwards, they give us their reaction to the QB market and the latest news in the NFL before free agency and a review of Jon Jones’ big victory at UFC 285, becoming the new UFC heavyweight champion.

item.title: MLB Part 2 Division Preview, MLB Spring Training, Gavin Lux, Manny Machado and Patrick Kane to the Rangers
item.description:
This week on the Heavy Hitters podcast, Dean and Charlie preview part two of their preview series of each MLB division with the NL Central along with updates on MLB spring training, a reaction to Manny Machado resigning in San Diego and Gavin Lux having a torn ACL. Afterwards, they give us their reaction to Patrick Kane being dealt from the Chicago Blackhawks to the NY Rangers in a big trade to help bolster the Rangers chances at a Stanley Cup.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

item.description:

After that, they gave us their reaction to the proposed rule changes in college football and the coaching hires that have taken place this past week in the NFL.

item.title: Super Bowl 57 Recap/Reaction
item.description:
Heavy Hitters is back for their second season! This week, Dean Gutic, along with his new co-host Charlie Norman, gives us a recap of Super Bowl 57 as the Kansas City Chiefs defeated the Philadelphia Eagles 38-35, along with their reaction to the big game and the halftime show.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: 2022 Cortaca Jug Recap and Playoff Game Preview vs UMass Dartmouth
item.description:
This week, on a special edition of the Heavy Hitters podcast, Dean Gutic is joined by the co-host of the One on One podcast, Jack Acello. Jack and Dean give us a recap of the 63rd annual Cortaca Jug, along with their experience at Yankee stadium. After that, both Jack and Dean give us a preview and their predictions for Ithaca’s upcoming playoff game against UMass Dartmouth.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

item.description:
This week on the Heavy Hitters podcast, Dean gives us a recap of what happened in week 3 along with an update of the AP Poll and a preview for what’s to come for week 4. After that, Dean gives us part 1 of his NHL predictions along with his reaction to the Nathan Mackinnon news. Finally, Dean gives us his signature heaviest hit of the week, but for this week it’s slam.

item.title: Chaos in College Football, UFC 279 Recap, Heaviest Hit of the Week
item.description:
This week on the Heavy Hitters podcast, Dean gives us a recap of the notable upsets that occurred in week 2 of the college football season, along with an update of the AP Poll and a preview for what’s to come in week 3. After that, Dean recaps UFC 279 that featured a massive shake up leading up to the pay per view. Finally, Dean gives us his signature heaviest hit of the week.

item.title: College Football Week 1 Recap, UFC 279 Predictions, Heaviest Hit of the Week
item.description:
In the debut episode of Heavy Hitters, Dean gives us a recap of all of the games that took place week 1 of the new college football season and gives us an update on the AP poll and a preview of what’s to come in week 2. After that, Dean gives his prediction of what he thinks will happen in the main event of UFC 279 between Nate Diaz and Khamzat Chimaev. The episode ends with Dean giving us his heaviest hitter for his heaviest hit of the week, a signature segment on the show.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

item.description:
Heavy Hitters, hosted by Dean Gutic, is your one-stop shop for all things contact sports. Every week, Dean will be discussing the likes of college football, hockey, and UFC fighting. Be sure to tune in weekly for all the heavy hits and harder takes!
